Test Name: LIME (Liver Induced Metabolic Enzyme); IGE (Immunoglobulin E); SERUM (routine serum analysis)
Specimen Type: LIME: Serum or plasma; IGE: Serum; SERUM: Serum
Purpose: LIME: Quantitative assessment of liver-induced metabolic enzyme activity; IGE: Measurement of total immunoglobulin E concentration; SERUM: Routine biochemical profiling of serum constituents.
Container: LIME: Lithium heparin (green top) or Gel Separator Tube (SST, gold top); IGE and SERUM: Gel Separator Tube (SST, gold top)
Equipment: LIME: Automated enzymatic analyzer; IGE: ELISA workstation/plate reader; SERUM: Automated chemistry analyzer
